name: Dessert Strike
description:
Yes, the spelling is intentional.

A top down helicopter shooter based on Desert Strike. 

Hold shift + left/right to move sideways and avoid enemy shots

The game was made for Game Off 2017.

This is an opensource game created with Gamemaker Studio 1.4.

https://github.com/HangryBear/DessertStrike

Credits

Music: Rolemusic, The Black Kitty Sound: Freesound.org, Building tiles: Pokemon Dawn Tileset, DeviantArt, Mountains: Nirdia, isometric mountains, All other art: my own.
